flawed_nl_solution:
He had 212 sheets and received 307 more for a total of 212+307 = <<212+307=591>>591 sheets
He gave out 156 so he has 591-156 = <<591-156=435>>435 sheets
#### 435

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 519, not 591. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
